>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.cQtmz297P5g6g5xv]{Advanced Mods}

Your drone is equipped with a thin coating that can change color to match the drone’s surroundings. Whenever your drone stays stationary for 1 round, it gains a +10 bonus to Stealth checks (this bonus doesn’t stack with theinvisibility spell or similar effects). If your drone takes any action, it loses this bonus until it once again spends 1 round remaining still.
